name: prendus-graphql-demo
description: Testing ground for the future of GraphQL with Prendus

scripts.install: npm install -g bower && bower install && cd src && npm install
scripts.static-build: tsc --module system --target ES2015 || echo done && cp -r src dist && cd dist && find . -name '*.html' -exec sed -i 's/.ts"><\/script>/.js"><\/script>/g' {} \; && cd ../src && rm typings/*.js && rm services/*.js && rm redux/*.js && rm components/*/*.js

author: Jordan Last <jordan.michael.last@gmail.com>
